summary.description: > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'maizeTE_variation' | Transposable elements contribute to dynamic genome content in maize | Structural transposable element (TE) annotation of multiple maize genomes | TEs along a region of the genome: | We reconstruct the history of TEs nesting into each other. For example, the blue TE on the left inserted first, and then was disrupted by the insertion of green and yellow TEs
summary.name: TEs
